name: Unstable49
description:
You play as a robot who left to keep an eye on the nuclear reactor and not to let it blow up!

3d model made by me. Robot design based on work of reddit user - u/yellowmarschmallow https://www.reddit.com/r/blender/comments/p1p6hc/cute_3d_low_poly_robot_i_feel_t...

Floor and wall textures are taken from unity asset store as well as particle tools. 

Didn't make it in time, so this version is not complete.

Version for Windows looks better :)

«Игра была разработана во время участия в гейм джеме на базе сообщества авторов игр «Индикатор»
